TopicTitle: Parts Manager Summoned While Intending to Adjust View Angle

Articles.Content:
It is far too easy to inadvertently summon the parts manager when all you want to do is change the camera angle.  This is because right click does both.  If you right click over a part, but don't drag for at least some minimum amount, the parts manager will come up.  This is incredibly annoying.  It starts to become a serious issue when your current view is filled with parts.  This doesn't have to be because your craft is huge.  It can be because you're zoomed in close attempting to do fine detail work.
